channel.title: Need a webdesigner/webdeveloper
channel.description:
Hi, i'm currently looking for a webdesigner/webdeveloper preferably as a partner, but i can just pay for your services too.
What do i need? I need a simple commenting system written in PHP and the website must be designed also. More details of the commenting system and the design will be provided for whoever is interested.
-I can't pay much, but i can try to get more money later.
- As for those who are willing to be a partner of mine, the profits of the website will ofcourse be shared and you will receive a percentage of the profit. If the website does not generate profit after a while, i will pay you as much as i can.

item.title: Need a webdesigner/webdeveloper
item.dc:creator: @hellow123 hellow123
